casebody.data:
State
v.
Morris Leavett Stith 173A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Stith, Morris Leavett. Charles G. Whitehead, Assistant Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
